EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit.2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit Confirmation_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the 2018 Honeywell Supplier Summit. Please save this email for future reference. Hotel & Logistics Book Your Hotel at the Best Rate A group of hotel rooms is available at Tempe Mission Palms Rate: $159/night plus tax Online reservations only: Honeywell Aerospace Leadership Summit - May 2018 <[[https://gc.synxis.com/rez.aspx?Hotel=12318&Chain=15564&arrive=5/21/2018&depart=5/23/2018&adult=1&child=0&group=2UF9R4]]> Schedule Monday, May 21 • Social Event: 5:30 p.m. – 7:30 p.m. • Pre-registration for the conference will be in the hotel lobby from 12:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.
Tuesday, May 22 • Registration and Coffee: 7:30 a.m. – 8 a.m. • Summit Conference: 8 a.m. – 5 p.m.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/may/honeywell-aerospace-supplier-summit]]> for more information.
We look forward to meeting you at the event!
Sincerely,
Dawn Palmer
palmer.dawn@honeywell.com <[[mailto:palmer.dawn@honeywell.com]]>
